description:
The protagonist of the adventure. He is an intergalactic trouble-shooter. He is a tough and reckless adventurer who captains Sword-Breaker, the legendary lost space ship from an ancient civilisation. He acquired his spaceship from his grandmother. Kain, a free spirit, keeps an open mind whatever the situation. Ever the optimist, he is always confident he will prevail over whatever troubles await him. His motto is "carry out any difficult assignment to the end!" Kain is the master of the Psycho-Blade, a weapon of psycho energy, requiring tremendous mental strength.
He always wears a black cloak, apparently also worn by his grandmother.
name: Kane Blueriver
